sentences.sContent: If you have insomnia, try my simple cure.
sentences.sContent_eng: If you have insomnia, try my simple cure.
sentences.sCn: 如果你有失眠症，试试我的简单疗法。

sentences.sContent: I have great friends whom I love but never want to hang out with because insomnia has stolen my desire to be social.
sentences.sContent_eng: I have great friends whom I love but never want to hang out with because insomnia has stolen my desire to be social.
sentences.sCn: 我有很多我喜爱的朋友，但是我再也不想和他们去逛街，因为失眠症使我失去了社交的欲望。

trans.tranOther: if you suffer from insomnia, you are not able to sleep
